favorites.title: IT ends: Chapter Two
favorites.description: In this horror sequel, the members of the Losers Club return to Derry, Maine to confront the evil entity that terrorized them as children.

favorites.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
favorites.description: The final chapter of the Skywalker saga sees the Resistance face off against the First Order one last time, while Rey confronts her own destiny.

favorites.title: Star Wars: Rogue One
favorites.description: Set before the events of the original Star Wars, a group of rebels undertake a dangerous mission to steal the plans for the Death Star.

favorites.title: The Princess and the Frog
favorites.description: This Disney animated musical follows the journey of Tiana, a hardworking waitress who dreams of opening her own restaurant, and Prince Naveen, who has been turned into a frog by an evil sorcerer.

favorites.title: Venom
favorites.description: When investigative journalist Eddie Brock bonds with an alien symbiote, he gains superhuman powers but also struggles to control his violent alter-ego, Venom.
